CA.gov (ALPHA)

Alpha.CA.gov product release 1

By JP Petrucione · 01/13/2020

Please test this work in progress

It’s been a very busy, very productive six weeks for our team. (Even despite the holiday season!)

As we’ve documented in our weekly “Done/doing” blogs, we’ve begun to build the proverbial plane, even as we’ve approaching cruising altitude.

Doing

  • Finalizing product framework
  • Continuing discovery and research on initial user needs
  • Creating additional content types prototypes
  • Adding new widgets to design pattern library
  • Starting qualitative research around user needs

Follow the Alpha.CA.gov project on Twitter and GitHub.

2020 State of California

This is an alpha project and a work in progress (Details)
